Queen of the Falls is an upcoming crime caper film written and directed by Rania Attieh and Daniel Garcia, and starring Pamela Anderson and Guy Pearce.
Cast
* Pamela Anderson
* Guy Pearce
Production
The film is written and directed by Rania Attieh and Daniel Garcia. Producers on the film include Mollye Asher and Shruti Ganguly. Production companies include Wrong Turn Productions, El Deseo, Maneki Film, and Infinity Hill. The cast is led by  Pamela Anderson and Guy Pearce. Principal photography is scheduled for early 2026.
